err_000: The game encounter connection error.  Please reload or relogin to try again.

err_004: Bonus has been claimed and no longer exists!  Please reload your game page  or relogin to try again.
err_005: Bonus game encounter incorrect input. Please reload your game to try  or  contact our customer service!
err_007: Your connection to the game has expired. Please clear your browser cache , reload the game or relogin. If problem persists, please contact our customer service.
err_010: You have insufficient balance. Please place a lower bet or alternatively top up your account.
err_012: Incomplete game setting. Please contact customer service.
err_014: Bonus or feature game incomplete . Please reload the game page or relogin to continue.
err_016: You have incomplete bonus game. Please clear your browser cache and try again.
err_017: The game encounter connection error.  Please try again later.
err_020: This game is under maintenance. Please proceed to other game. Thank you.
err_021: System maintenance for better service in progress.  We should be back shortly ! Thank you for your patience.
err_024: The following error occurred attempting to open multiple connection of the same game. Multi connection of the same game is not allowed. Close all previous connection of the same game and try again. Thank you.
err_025: Following error occurred attempting to send incorrect game id.
err_027: This account does not has permission to access the game page. Please check with our customer service!
